alert.note: Alert for Smith (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 25 at 8:41AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Smith County through 915 AM CDT... At 841 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Burns, or 17 miles northeast of Magee, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Burns around 850 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Polkville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. High winds can bring down trees and large limbs resulting in serious injury or property damage. Exercise extreme caution when outdoors during such strong winds...and be especially aware of older trees.
